title: DoctaPop........

replies.body: He took a break for a few weeks.
replies.body_tagged: He took a break for a few weeks.

replies.body: DoctaPop is taking a break from Sr Moderator
replies.body_tagged: DoctaPop is taking a break from Sr Moderator

replies.body: Hoopsman are you joining the clan or not? i tried to add you to the clan then you left.
replies.body_tagged: Hoopsman are you joining the clan or not? i tried to add you to the clan then you left.

replies.body:
Please refrain from making posts that are unrelated to the original topic.

If you wish to speak to Hoopsman about clan matters, ask him in the "Teams" section in the forums, or ask him through personal means (Skype, for example.)

As for the topic, DoctaPop is taking a break.

replies.body:
I understand wanting a break totally.

SUGGESTION: I feel like there should be official announcements on the forums about staff members taking breaks or leaving to clear up some of the confusion that happens when these things occur so everyone is informed quicker and so we know whether it's a temporary or permanent leave.
